subjectArray.subject: Alcohol:
subjectArray.patient:
•Have 10 or less drinks a week if you are a woman
•Have 15 or less drinks per week if you are a man
A standard drink is :
12 ounces of 5% alcohol beer or
5 ounces of 7-10% alcohol wine or
1.5 ounces of 40% alcohol liquor
A standard drink contains 13.6 grams of alcohol.
subjectArray.provider: Screening for misuse and behavioural counseling USPSTF B (2013)

subjectArray.subject: Drug abuse:
subjectArray.patient:
Get help if you are using drugs or are addicted to a substance/gambling:
each province or territory has a help line : [[more; https://www.canada.ca/en/health-canada/services/substance-abuse/get-help/get-help-with-drug-abuse.html]]
subjectArray.provider: screening and counseling USPSTF I (2018) under review

subjectArray.subject: Stop skin cancer:
subjectArray.patient:
•Wear protective clothing
•Limit time in the sun (worst time: between 10 am and 3 pm)
•Wear sunscreen (minimum SPF 30) : recommended
subjectArray.provider:
To prevent melanoma:
decrease exposure to sun with :protective clothing , sunscreen min SPF 30 CTFPHC appraised guideline 2008
